meanings.definition: The quality of being casual or informal in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her offhandedness in conversation made everyone feel comfortable.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate his offhandedness when we are hanging out.
meanings.sent3: His offhandedness about the situation lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The offhandedness of his remarks caught me off guard.
meanings.sent5: The offhandedness of her wave conveyed a sense of ease.
